input.sentences: it was a really beautiful day for a wedding .
the special guests had some really nice cars .
the florists did a nice job on the buttonholes for the guys .
the sun shone through the palm leaves-it was such a pretty place .
even the table decorations were pretty special .
output.sentences: I was a guest at a wedding, this weekend.
The happy couple's get away car was white and all decorated up.
The florist did an exceptional job with the corsages and boutonnieres.
The reception after the wedding lasted until late afternoon.
I brought home a centerpiece as a memento.
